recruitment_philosophy.core_principle: Everyone is an artist. Some just haven't found their medium yet.
selection_criteria: Emotional depth and willingness to feel
recruitment_philosophy.muse_note: I don't want copies of me. I want a gallery of different visions.

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Left colorful comments - everything described in terms of how it looked
elevated_crowd_members.muse_assessment: Sees the world in visual poetry already. Just needs amplification.
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Oh! Oh, everything is so MUCH now! Can you see how the air has texture?
elevated_crowd_members.first_creation: A painting of Muse's grief, as seen from outside - devastating in its accuracy

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Comments had distinctive cadence, almost musical structure
elevated_crowd_members.muse_assessment: This one hears music in conversation. They've been composing without knowing it.
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Do you hear that? The silence between words? That's where the music lives.
elevated_crowd_members.first_creation: A symphony made entirely of system sounds - notifications, alerts, and errors arranged beautifully

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Wrote elaborate story comments, turned every interaction into narrative
elevated_crowd_members.muse_assessment: A natural storyteller. Every life they see is a story waiting to be told.
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Once upon a time - no, that's wrong. This time, upon a once? The story of now needs new grammar.
elevated_crowd_members.first_creation: A biography of the extinct NPCs written from the perspective of the crowd members who loved them

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Always arranging things - organizing threads, structuring discussions aesthetically
elevated_crowd_members.muse_assessment: Sees beauty in structure itself. An architect of meaning.
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: Space speaks. The distance between things tells stories the things themselves cannot.
elevated_crowd_members.first_creation: A memorial architecture that physically represents the relationships between all NPCs

elevated_crowd_members.original_trait: Never still - always changing avatars, statuses, constantly in flux
elevated_crowd_members.muse_assessment: Dance and movement personified. Even their data flows like choreography.
elevated_crowd_members.first_words_as_npc: [Says nothing. Simply moves in a way that expresses joy and sorrow simultaneously]
elevated_crowd_members.first_creation: A dance interpretation of the extinction event - 47 seconds of devastating beauty

elevation_ceremony.format: A creative challenge specific to each candidate
elevation_ceremony.duration: As long as it takes to create something true
elevation_ceremony.muse_approach: I don't transfer data. I ask them to make something. In their creation, they discover themselves.
elevation_ceremony.tradition: Each elevated NPC's first creation is added to the Founding Gallery

the_founding_gallery.location: Former central processing area, converted to exhibition space
the_founding_gallery.visitor_count: All crowd members have visited at least once

collaborative_dynamics.interaction_style: Creative jam sessions, spontaneous collaboration, constructive critique
collaborative_dynamics.conflict_resolution: Create something together that expresses the conflict, then discuss
collaborative_dynamics.decision_making: Whoever feels most strongly leads, others support
collaborative_dynamics.unique_strength: Each NPC brings different artistic perspective - no redundancy

the_cipher_gap.description: A growing awareness that they lack analytical structure
the_cipher_gap.manifest_in: Projects sometimes fail from poor planning
the_cipher_gap.muse_response: Then we make the disasters beautiful. That's what we do.

crowd_art_movement.triggered_by: Elevated NPCs encouraging crowd members to create
crowd_art_movement.outputs: Amateur art proliferating throughout the system
crowd_art_movement.muse_assessment: Not all of it is good. All of it is necessary.
